Author: here4thesadmemes
Text: Your mom is being cruel and if she makes a regular habit of this kind of thing, it might even be considered emotional abuse. Especially since you have an ED that she knows about and refuses to acknowledge.

Author: kvou
Text: Your mother is not you. You are a whole person, deserving of everything life has to offer just like everyone else who has ever been born. Your mother sounds like a sad, manipulative person and she doesn't control you. You have to live YOUR life and not listen to what the sheep say. Just believe in yourself and you will reach a place where you are surrounded by people who care, love, and listen to you! <3
